155212.content:
Hey everybody, LONG time lurker here and I've always wanted to contribute. I wrote this in about an hour or so. It has tons of grammar errors so forgive me in advance. Still I think at least one person could find enjoyment in it. It deals heavily with Mortal Kombat backstory and stuff. If that's not your thing ctrl-f straight to the fight scene, it starts at "the next morning."
Heres the two combatants, Tanya http://www.geekbomb.net/wp-content/uploa... and Ermac http://s3.accelerated-ideas.com/news/ima...
I got the idea for this story from Tanya's fatality, "Bloody boots". You can watch it here, it's quite the turn on for us foot guys. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CfgK4_1F...
If it's well received I'll probably write more but I just have very little motivation to do so. I hope it has enough foot content for those of you. Here's the story.

FOOTALITY Part 1.

With the death of Mileena, Tanya had become a lonely rebel. The once bustling Edenian resistance was no more without their prized queen. Even her close ally and consort Rain had adandoned her after they had faced off and failed against Cassie and D'vorah's might, earlier a few weeks ago
.
With no purpose except revenge and hope for a better future for her people, Tanya set out to destroy Kotal Kahns power in any way possible.

Shinnok's plan had failed and Kotal's crew had returned to Outworld to the city of Z'Unkahrah, devastated after their recent defeat to the hands of Cassie, Jacqui, Kung Jin and Takeda. As much as the crew was demoralized at the loss to mere children, things looked good in Outworld finally. The Rebels were defeated, the Shokan were still on Kotal's side and there was finally some peace in the world. With things resuming back to normal, Kotal had his crew get back to various tasks during the peacetime. Erron Black patrolled the streets and prevented crime , Ermac helped construct mighty architecture for the main cities and Ferra/Torr took care of the dungeons.

Tanya knew as she wandered the Outskirks of Outworld that she had to pick Kotal's crew piece from piece if she was to ever have a shot at her vengeance for Mileena's murder. She made her way into Kotal's main city under the assumption that no one would be looking for here there. With a burlap sack she covered her vibrant yellow colored clothing and made her way through the streets.

The town was still under massive reconstruction since the Shokan attack all those years ago, also many pillars and statues were still being constructed throughout the city. Just outside of the gates to the city was the enormous effigy of the Kotal himself. The face completely done, but the body still needed refining. The quarry for the building blocks wasn't far but transporting them was a nightmare. This was Ermac's task, for with his telekinesis abilities allowed for easy transport of the blocks.

Tanya spied from afar and gauged Ermac's strength. He was a construct of over thousands of souls, and it wouldn't be an easy task taking him out. But he was a traitor to Mileena and he must be made an example of. Although Tanya was an excellent sorceror and pyromancer herself, her magic was no match for Ermac's. He had been said to have the ability to even shrink his foes to the size of mere inches. This was one of his common tactics, he was notorious for beating his enemy into submission and taunting them as he shrunk them, until he gave them the final blow. His giant boot.

Tanya knew if she could subvert his magic in some way, he may just be susceptible to her fighting skills. Tanya decided to visit the underbelly of the city, in search of some way to quell his insatiable soul magic. After days of searching she finally found a witch of immense abilities.

Her shop nestled in between the hidden streets of Z'Unkahrah. Tanya apporached the Witch in her rickety old shop, floorboards creaked with every step from Tanya's booted soles. "You must be the Witch of Old Gaerthstown." said Tanya. "Who's asking?" the old ladies' voice was croaky, sounding that of a crow. "A fan, I've heard of your deeds, you turned a fourth of Kotal's vanguard to dust in the cities defense! True power needs to be respected." Tanya seemed genuine in her speech. "It's true, I hope you don't work for the wretch, he turned my city into rubble that one. If only I had gotten the spell right, he would've lost his whole army that fateful night." Tanya's interests had peaked after hearing that. "What if I told you I could get revenge for all the atrocities he has commited? I've come back to Z'Unkahrah to pick apart his loyal servants one by one." Tanya said. The witch was beyond ecstatic for someone with the courage and willingness to finally stand up to the villain. "What will you need?" the old witch sneered with a smug look of satisfaction.

The next morning Ermac was headed into the quarry to begin his duties. This early into the day the workers hadn't even been ready to start piling up the statue and Ermac was alone. Tanya sat just outside the quarry until Ermac was completely secluded. "Kotal's soullful lapdog, I thought a sorceror with your power would be above such trivial manners Ermac." Tanya's voice just held a pretensious attitute. You could smell her smugness miles away. Ermac lowered his body from his hovering state to address the upstart. "Tanya, you've made it so easy for me. Killing you will get me out of these tedious tasks, they are beneath me. Just as you will be in a moment." Tanya smirked at his statement, alluding to his stomping technique, "pest control" they called it. She was ready.

Ermac shot out a projectile of his green soul magic at Tanya, but her acrobatic skills were unmatched. Twisting through the air the 5'7 female danced between his blasts, ever so nearing her target. Ermac's decrepid face looked alarm at her skill and relentlessness. He lifted himself from the ground into his hoverring stance, fearing her attacks in melee range. But Tanya used her surroundings. She jumped from little rock to bigger rock to the biggest and aimed her booted heel at Ermac's hip. Direct contact sent Ermac flying downward at least 10 feet. On all fours he lifted himself, but as he turned there she was. Her kicks aiming directly for his head. He blocked her blows, first a kick from the left a, then from the right, over and over she kicked about aiming for his face. Simple attacks wouldn't suffice it seemed. Ermac then tried to distance himself to cast a spell but Tanya wouldn't allow it, she knew his only real weakness was hand to hand combat and she had to make quick on it.

Tanya decided to switch it up a bit, throwing a low kick to his shins, this caught Ermac off guard. Her fists plowed straight into Ermac's face. He stumbled, allowing Tanya to stay on the offensive. With rapid haste she grabbed both of Ermac's arms and pulled him in close. Her leg shot out behind her and arched over her head, right into his face. The scorpion kick had devastated Ermac. Who appeared dizzy and distraught. Tanya rushed forward again but Ermac unleashed souls, blasting her back. "I'm sick of your powers Witch, it's time to crush you once and for all." His ghastly voice echoed throughout the courtyard. So loud was his voice that some of the homeless had wandered around the quarry to see the commotion. Without any other options Ermac started channelling his last chance.

         Tanya got back up quickly to find Ermac 10 feet from her, forming a ball of green magic and uttering gibberish, "esh can mesza mulauso ka za". She knew what he was trying, his attempt to shrink her. Tanya grasped at her leg, a small rectangular mirrored plate. Her secret weapon. Ermac's spell was ready. "Now Tanya you will be a stain on my foot!". He sent out the ball of magic, and appeared pompous. Until the ball didn't connect. Instead it shot straight at him! "Whaaa?". The whole world grew in size immensely. The once giant walls behind him, turned colossal, without a top. Then he saw her. Tanya walked up to him slowly with her grin to one side of her face. "Awh, poor Ermac. I thought I was going to be crushed. What's the matter little guy? Are you afraid? You see I knew you'd try something like this, you men are so predictable. That plate of mine reflects spells, even ones as powerful as yours. You should've never betrayed the Emperess". Ermac was in utter fear and was only 6 inches tall. Tanya's 5'7 frame was now gigantic, as her boots were only inches from the terrifyed Ermac. Ermac shouted for mercy but his voice was that of a squeak. The crowd was in disbelief, as they saw one of their prized generals turned to a size of a doll.

Will Tanya humiliate Ermac or stomp him?
155212.title: Tanya, Footality Part 1.

1552121.content:
Tanya's yellow boots pushed Ermac onto his back, pinning him. "What to do with you Ermac... tsk tsk tsk. I was just going to stomp you into oblivion, but you said some pretty crude stuff. You wanted to crush me? That's not very kind of you, you'd think one of those thousands of souls would have a heart. And you got my boots all bloody from our little fight, that won't do. I think you need to learn some respect for ladies Ermac. You need to be humbled. I have the perfect idea!". Tanya started to unzip one of her long yellow boots. Her tan feet glowed in the summer sun, they looked to be a size 7 or 8. Her toenails were an unmistakable black tone, even the crowd could make it out. Her feet were plenty beautiful but beyond deadly, as the fight had taken Ermac's courage away. "Our little fight got my feet a bit sweaty, I hope you don't mind stinky feet." Tanya picked Ermac up by the back of his shirt. "Awh don't worry, you're powerful, I'm sure you won't be crushed instantly. Just use some of your soul magic to appease some of the pressure down there. Hahaha, it's fitting really Ermac, you could use some of the other sole in your life. Enjoy".

Tanya slowly pushed Ermac into the boot. He rolled into the bottom, his face near the toe of the boot. The smell was unbearable. A mix of leather, sweat and pure vinegar. The once well shaped bandages around his face held no defense for Ermac's poor nose. The smell was all consuming, and Ermac found himself gagging right away. "I forgot to tell you Ermac, those are my only pair of shoes! So get comfortable". Her voice was somewhat muffled as she lowered her monstrous foot. The tan balls of her feet had little to no wrinkles as they came in first. Ermac shot off any of the soul magic he could to try to prevent the giant sole from trapping him, but to no avail. Most of the crowd was disgusted and boo'd the Edenian. Some sat in awe, as one of their famed generals had turned into a shoe sole. And very few sat in lust, licking their lips at the sight of such a beautiful girl completely dominating her foe.

Tanya zipped her boot back up and her smile grew as she felt Ermac's whole body struggling under her weight. Her middle toes played with Ermac's face, and lightly tickled her feet. She couldn't help but giggle at what had happened. She waved to the crowd, and blew a few kisses their way before saying "Tell your Emperor that Edenian's never quit or give up, and his days are numbered. Anyone who gets in my way will share a fate like Ermac's". With her hands on her hip she raised her booted sole to the audience.

Although Tanya was having a ball, Ermac's time was much different. She was right when she said he wouldn't be crushed right away. His soul magic appeased some of her weight but he couldn't keep it up forever. Especially with the damned stench of her toes right in his face. It appears Tanya hadn't ever washed out her boots, as her feet held large gumps of toejam. As Tanya finished her speech she made for the exit of the quarry, her feet taking off in a rush. The running is what really started to break Ermac's concentration. Constant pushing down from her giant feet crushed up and down destroying Ermac's resolve. Then the real sweating started. Slowly Ermac's vision was filled with his upcoming fate. The sweat was dislodging her toejam. With all of his efforts keeping the foot from crushing him, Ermac couldn't prevent the toe fungi from entering his mouth. Tons of it seeped all around his face and some up into his nostrils as he begged for a reprieve from her running. But she didn't stop, she had a long way to go.

So much of the gunk had gotten around Ermac, he couldn't keep it up anymore. He had lifted giant stones and boulders for the past few weeks, but this foot was a whole new task. Something he couldn't handle. With so much distraction, the raunchy smell, the overpowering taste, the sight of her giant foot and even the humiliation of how she had so easily defeated him was getting to him. His will was finally broken. 1000 souls will's had been broken by this one lady. He had failed, as he let go of his magic, SLAM, the foot came down with full force. His whole body became mangled as her foot almost completely stomped him out. SLAM. Again her running had caused her feet to fall. His whole body become a shell of its former self. His face once looked like a zombie, now that of mush. SLAM. The final stomp. Tanya felt it, his bones finally break under the pressure, she stopped her jaunt finally. FOOTALITY. Smearing her foot around in her boot she had known Ermac's fate. She laughed again to herself, how many men has Ermac crushed? A taste of his own medicine she supposed. Also the taste of defeet. She continued on to the Witch's abode, ready to plan her next conquest. This was just the beginning. To get revenge for Mileena. To keep the hope of Edenia alive. To subject the Emperor to his fate, her sweaty feet.

Who's Next? Erron Black or Ferra/Torr

1552211.content:
Ashrah walked slowly through the entrance of a grand, forsaken temple hall. The large stone structure had been damaged greatly by time and numerous battles, and only scant light found its way inside through the many holes and cracks in its ceiling. After she had taken a few steps inside, Ashrah heard a soft fluttering of wings and turned around just in time to find Nitara swooping down from above and smashing into the ground.

Nitara stared at Ashrah's face with a fierce scowl for a moment, bearing her fangs before jumping back some distance and moving into a fighting stance. "You..." Ashrah said softly, almost in a whisper. "You have crossed my plans before, Vampire." she said matter-of-factly, shifting gracefully into her own stance. Nitara gave her a seething hiss as a response. "And I more than prepared to do so again, slaughterer!"

The two women circled each other for a few moments, the gaze of their keen and battle-eager eyes locked together as suddenly, a mighty and booming voice announced "Round one - FIGHT!"

They both obliged without question. Nitara came charging at Ashrah at once, fierce and steaming like a locomotive and attacked her with a wild flurry of swinging arms and the razor-sharp claws of her hands! Ashrah couldn't avoid getting hit completely, but danced around nimbly and slammed Nitara in her back with the palm of her outstretched hand! Nitara flinched backwards, tried charging forward again but was soon met with a bone-shattering kick of her opponent that hit her dead in the stomach, shoving her back a bit and stunning her in place for just a second.

That was all the time Ashrah needed; sliding forward like greased lightning, she sent a quick flurry of jabs and palm-strikes directed towards Nitara's head before finishing off with a mighty, charged kick that sent Nitara smashing to the ground and rolling backwards, crying out in pain and boundless fury all along! Ashrah came right after her, but right then, Nitara began to retaliate! Using the help of her bat-like wings, she launched herself from the ground with great speed, slamming right into the coming Ashrah and knocking her back a little.

Ashrah swung her hands at her enemy instinctively, but Nitara was suddenly gone; having darted away with super-human speed, she evaded a few of Ashrah's attacks before countering with a fierce knee slamming right into Ashrah's chest, sending her back reeling. Nitara used the opportunity and launched herself up high above her enemy, then shooting down at her like a hawk preying on a mouse and stomping on Ashrah's neck with the full force of her momentum, sending her crashing down onto the marbled stone floor so hard that several fine cracks appeared in it!

Ashrah rolled away with the last of her strength, evading another attack of Nitara and coming back on her feet just as Nitara came dashing after her, fangs extended! Ashrah took a sidestep and met Nitara's onslaught with a spinning round-house kick, shattering her momentum but not breaking off the attack! A fierce in-fight broke out, with Ashrah and Nitara locked almost toe to toe, swinging, striking and kicking at each other with blinding speed, each one desperate to land a truly damaging blow!

After some time, both of the woman threw a powerful kick at the same time, their shins meeting in mid-air with such an impact that both of them were sent stumbling back a few steps and breaking off the fight for a moment. By then, Ashrah was panting heavily, several strands of her black hair were sticking all over her head and her hands were starting to shake from the sheer exhaustion! At the very least, she could see that Nitara wasn't looking much fitter either, even though her face still shone with the desire to fight and win.

Whoever lands the next attack will likely seal the fate of this battle... Ashrah thought, and just as she swallowed and a single droplet of sweat fell from her brow, she saw Nitara charging at her once again!
1552211.title: Ashrah VS Nitara - TEST YOUR MIGHT

15522111.content:
Ashrah squint her eyes in concentration as she watched the oncoming Vampiress flying at her with murderous intend. Nitara threw a mighty, charged attack at her, but Ashrah managed to spin away just in time and even more; she landed a shattering spinning back-hand with the full destructive power of the combined movements! The back of her hand struck Nitara full in the head, with such a forceful impact that Ashrah felt the shock travelling all the way up to her shoulder!

"Gahhh..." made Nitara as the attack hit home, sent her head rocking back and finally ended her fighting spirit for good! Ashrah was slowly coming closer, catching her breath as all Nitara was still capable of doing was moving her head around in a nonsensical circular motion, hoping against all odds that she would somehow regain her balance again. However, it was far too late for that!

"FINISH HER!!!" The mighty voice from before cried, shaking the very foundations of the temple. Ashrah did not have to be asked twice. Showing a wicked grin that was somewhat unfitting for her overall composure, she walked up to Nitara and lightly shoved her over. Nitara barely caught her fall, landing on her back as Ashrah came down on her, sitting on her stomach and hooking her arms with her own! Nitara hissed as she weakly tried to struggle... But it was no use. She was securely pinned to the ground, even her wings were flattened beneath her back and in her current state, she couldn't even throw Ashrah down from herself.

"Now I've got you..." Ashrah said in a shaky voice, licking her lips. "...and now the wicked Vampire that you are shall be cleansed and purified by my clear and pure essence!" Nitara had no idea what she was going on about, but she grew worried as Ashrah moved her heavy, boot-clad feet next to her head. Her situation grew even more dire as Ashrah slowly slipped them off. Her long, slender feet came out steaming hot and dripping wet, a fine layer of footsweat covered them so well that their entire surface was weakly shining in the dim light as the moisture reflected the light. Nitara was actually somewhat stunned. All that sweat and the sweltering heat coming off from that aside... She had never seen a foot looking simply that beautiful. Although quite big in overall, Ashrah's feet were very long and slender, with high, pronounced arches and heels and relatively long, slender toes.

It was then when Nitara took her first breath and the sheer smell of Ashrah's feet hit her. Instantly, Nitara was sputtering and coughing, trying instantly to pull back somehow, but to little effect. She had experienced many frightening things, but the stench of these feet was something special. It was a very strong, thick smell of well-aged cheese, vinegar and just sheer sweat, with a few distinct undertones of something bitter and sickly-sweet, like fermenting corn. The sheer strength and sharpness of the aroma drove tears into Nitara's eyes and made her mind go fuzzy.

"Aren't they simply divine?" Ashrah began to ramble "As a sign of my devotion, I haven't washed my feet ever since I began fighting in these boots... And many a battle I have had in them. Do you smell this?" she asked, moving her horrible feet so close to Nitara's face that she could feel the heavy, damp heat from them on her face and wiggling her moist, sweaty toes right above Nitara's brow. Nitara was certain that everybody with a working nose could smell it, even from the other side of this accursed temple, yet having the source waved directly in your face like that was an all-together different experience.

Nitara made sure not to breath through her nose, but even when sucking air through her clenched teeth, she couldn't evade the smell completely. "What are you doing, you lunatic..." She hissed, blinking tears out of her offended eyes. "...you won, alright? Just kill me already- Ahhhhhh!"

Ashrah decided to do something much more cruel instead. Without warning, her warm, moist feet came pressing down all over Nitara's horrified face, engulfing her in a hot, moist darkness of pure, rancid foot-smell. Nitara bucked weakly in a primal panic, all her senses were screaming at her to somehow get away from these oppressing, hot feet, but there was just no way to get out. Bite her! Bite her! A thought came racing in Nitara's mind, but even that proved futile as one of Ashrah's feet hooked its heel under her chin, forcing her mouth shut while rubbing the greasy underside of her smelly sole and her foot's ball directly under her nose.

Nitara ran out of air and was forced to take a deep breath all through her nose, drinking in the ripe, cheesy stench of Ashra's long, wet feet as they slowly caressed her entire face. The shock of experiencing such a powerful aroma was terrible; Nitara's mind went blank for a moment, everything fading from her consciousness but that heavy, disgusting smell of sweat and unwashed feet on her face. She groaned pitifully and heard Ashrah's voice somewhere in the background. "Yes... Smell my feet. Let their heavenly aroma purge your very soul! Doesn't it feel good?"

It did most certainly not feel good. Nitara wanted to writhe and struggle, but as she filled her lungs with another load of Asharah's wet, cheesy foot-aroma, she felt her strength fading completely. Such a... stench... I can't bear this anymore! Please... let it end! Nitara thought, but Ashrah's soles pushing on her lips didn't even allow her to beg. Again and again was she forced to inhale their smell, until she began to really feel somewhat purged; All other feelings seemed to recede, Nitara felt almost weightless and a dim, buzzing monotone sound seemed to play in her ears. I'm about to pass out She realised, tears of shame and humiliation beginning to form in the corners of her eyes. Losing an honorable duel against a worthy opponent and dying valiantly was one thing, but this...

Ashrah sensed her victim's condition as well. Forcing the toes of her one foot between Nitara's almost unconscious lips and spreading the other ones over her nose, she forced the most brutal, efficient areas of her feet on her enemy at the same time. "Prepare to see the light!" Ashrah yelled and a second later, Nitara's instinct to keep breathing forced her to take a deep sniff directly from between Ashrah's toes! The stench pouring from them was unlike anything she had ever experienced before, even sharper and stronger than the sheer soles of Ashrah's feet!

For a moment, Nitara shivered and shook in agony as the pure stench and taste of those ungodly feet washed over herself! Then, suddenly, all her movements died and she let out a final, strained gasp before finally being knocked out for good! Ashrah smiled a very proud and satisfied smile, put her high white boots back on and climbed back off from her victim, dusting herself off quickly and striking a pose. Nitara was sprawled out on the floor, her eyes opened blindly and her mouth still a bit open. Just from looking at her, she seemed to be positively dead!

Even Shao Kahn - who had been undoubtedly watching these entire proceedings from somewhere - seemed to be a bit taken aback by that display, as Ashrah stood there for a moment in complete silence, before he caught himself and proclaimed:

" Ashrah wins! FATALITY! "
15522111.title: Ashrah wins - FATALITY
